# methodDetails

**Instance Property**

A dictionary that contains the details of the change.

## Declaration

```swift
readonly attribute object methodDetails;
```

## Change Information

- **methodName**: The identifier for the payment method to use for the transaction.

items.description: The identifier for the payment method to use for the transaction.
items.name: methodName
